string-array.name: config_instructions
string-array.item: How to pair Storyous Assistant with POS
Go to Storyous POS and open the left side menu clicking on the top left menu button
Use this app to scan the QR code that will be displayed in POS

string-array.name: create_order_instructions
string-array.item: Synchronization is enabled. When a customer calls you on this phone, his phone number will be shared with POS.
Touch and hold "Quick order" button. Customer delivery info will be shown.
Choose phone number that is currently calling you in "Phone number" section

We will fill in the rest of the information about the customer for you, if this customer ordered from you in the past. If it\'s his first order, simply fill in the remaining info and we will save it for next time.
The app runs on the background, so it does not have to be active for it to work.
